#summary How to create a spkg for Sage

= Steps =

{{{
$ hg clone http://hg.sympy.org/sympy-spkg/
$ cd sympy-spkg
}}}
Edit get-hg
{{{
$ ./get-hg
$ cd ..
$ cp -a sympy-spkg sympy-0.5.13
$ ~/ext/sage/sage -pkg sympy-0.5.13
}}}
And a fresh package sympy-0.5.13.spkg is created. Install it:
{{{
$ ~/ext/sage/sage -f sympy-0.5.13.spkg
}}}
Test it
{{{
$ ~/ext/sage/sage -t ~/ext/sage/devel/sage/sage/calculus/test_sympy.py
}}}
